title: Commending the participants in the Suffolk County Little League upon the occasion of observing Suffolk County Little League Baseball Days 2011
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commending the participants of the Suffolk County
Little League upon the occasion of observing Suffolk County Little Leag-
ue Baseball Days 2011

WHEREAS,  Little  League  is  a  wholesome sports activity for the young
people of Suffolk County, Long Island, New York State  and  our  Nation,
involving  children,  teenagers,  coaches,  parents,  sponsors and other
interested men and women, helping to build character for  young  compet-
itors  through  the  lessons of sportsmanship and competition learned on
the ballfield; and
  WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports are achieved  by
practice,  team play and team spirit, nurtured by dedicated coaching and
parental interest and support; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to commend the  partic-
ipants  of the Suffolk County Little League upon the occasion of Suffolk
County Little League Baseball Days 2011; and
  WHEREAS, The coaches of Suffolk County Little  League  Baseball  teams
are skilled and inspirational tutors, who work diligently to help devel-
op character and proficiency in their young players; and
  WHEREAS,  Sports  competition helps instill the values of teamwork and
pride in our outstanding athletes who have clearly made  a  contribution
to the excellence of Suffolk County Little League Baseball; and
  WHEREAS,  Suffolk  County  Little  League  Baseball  has significantly
contributed to the quality of life of the residents  of  Suffolk  County
and  Long Island by always encouraging and promoting greater understand-
ing and community pride among Suffolk  County  and  Long  Island's  many
generations of young, and not so young, citizens; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commend the participants of the Suffolk County Little  League  upon  the
occasion  of  Suffolk County Little League Baseball Days 2011; and be it
further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the participants in Suffolk  County  Little  League  Baseball
Days 2011.
